#### **Overview**  
This project analyzes Instagram analytics for _nailsbydre_ to uncover optimal posting times and content patterns that drive visibility and reach. By aligning posts with audience behavior, this strategy boosts engagement and streamlines content planning.

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### **Learning Outcomes**  
- Understand follower activity trends and peak engagement times
- Analyze how day-of-week and time-of-day affect visibility. 
- Improve consistency and planning in content rollout. 
- Build a scheduling strategy based on real performance insights
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### **Key Skills Gained**  
- Content calendar development
- Instagram timing analytics
- Engagement pattern recognition
- Strategic content scheduling
- Strategy development
